name: appsmith
description: Appsmith is a low-code platform for building internal tools quickly using drag-and-drop widgets, custom queries, and REST/GraphQL integrations. It can be self-hosted and includes role-based access, versioning, and triggers.
features: Low-Code Platform: Build internal tools quickly with drag-and-drop widgets. Ship faster.
Database Integration: Connect to REST APIs, GraphQL, and databases seamlessly. Universal connectivity.
Custom Queries: Write SQL, JavaScript, or use visual query builders. Full flexibility.
Role-Based Access: Control who can view and edit applications and data. Secure by design.
Version Control: Git integration for tracking changes and collaboration. Professional workflow.
Pre-Built Widgets: Extensive library of UI components ready to use. Build beautiful interfaces.
Self-Hosted: Deploy on your infrastructure for complete data control. Privacy guaranteed.
